title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Online Collaboration and Team Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: An intensive program training current practitioners in effective team collaboration skills in online environments, combining theory and practice through blended methods to enhance workplace applicability

learning_goals: Learners can complete a small-scale team project within 48 hours using online collaboration tools.
Learners can design and implement a structured process for role allocation and shared responsibility in digital environments.
Learners can resolve conflicts arising during online team activities within 24 hours using collaboration support tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
